scripts.remindctl: pnpm -s version:sync && swift package clean && swift run remindctl
scripts.lint: swift format lint --recursive Sources Tests && swiftlint
scripts.check: pnpm -s lint && pnpm -s test && pnpm -s coverage
scripts.build: pnpm -s version:sync && mkdir -p bin && swift build -c release --product remindctl && cp .build/release/remindctl bin/remindctl && codesign --force --sign - --identifier com.steipete.remindctl bin/remindctl
